parameters.name: options.delay
parameters.description: Time in milliseconds the pointer must dwell over the element. Default: 100.

parameters.name: options.tolerance
parameters.description: Pixel movement allowed before the intent timer resets. Default: 6.

returnValues.name: handlers
returnValues.description: Mouse event handlers (onMouseEnter, onMouseLeave, onMouseMove) to be spread on the target element.

returnValues.name: isIntent
returnValues.description: Reactive state that becomes true only when a hover is deemed intentional.
